posts.content:
This bus is in a very good condition throughout and reasonably original. A South African import.

All rust has been removed and replaced with new panels and has been freshly painted in a traditional blue and white finish.

This is in a perfect working condition,mechanically sound and drives like a dream.

The interior has been reupholstered perfectly with a rock and roll bed. A full restoration portfolio is available.

All duties and VAT has been paid.

The van is currently is the Netherlands, transport anywhere in the UK and EU can easily be arranged if needed.

Please drop me a mail for any further info or pictures or give me a call - 01227392836

Selling at GBP 11,600.
